title: How to Make Yum Yum Sauce

steps.headline: Mix all ingredients together until completely smooth.
Let sit overnight in the refrigerator.

tyn: Tomato Free Yum Yum Sauce (with Mirin)
Yum Yum Sauce with the Lot
text: Mix all ingredients together until completely smooth.  Let sit overnight in the refrigerator. Serve within 10 days. Finished.
sentences: Mix all ingredients together until completely smooth.
Let sit overnight in the refrigerator.
